snippet: The official instrument of the 2014 World Cup in Brazil, a maraca-like instrument called the caxirola, has been banned from the Confederations Cup.
abstract: Official instrument of soccer's 2014 World Cup in Brazil, maraca-like instrument called the caxirola, is banned from Confederations Cup because of safety concerns; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: The official instrument of the 2014 World Cup in Brazil, a maraca-like instrument called the caxirola, has been banned from the Confederations Cup.

headline.main: Not as Loud, but More Dangerous
headline.print_headline: Not as Loud, but More Dangerous
